title: [Good]  You have the right to request lower Charges from Third Party Providers for services or goods received through Uber

tosdr.case: [Good]  You have the right to request lower Charges from Third Party Providers for services or goods received through Uber-good-undefined
tosdr.tldr: [Good]  You have the right to request lower Charges from Third Party Providers for services or goods received through Uber, and Uber will respond accordingly to any request from a Third Party Provider to modify those Charges.  You may also choose to cancel your request for services or goods from a Third Party Provider at any time prior to such Third Party Provider's arrival, in which case you may be charged a cancellation fee.
